reviews.review_text: Overall, the food was great, but the experience would have been better if the air conditioning had been on, and the staff were more polite to customers(Rather Than shouting in the counter )

Decided to visit as my friends and I wanted some food before going back to our hotels. When ordering told we were not allowed to sit down and eat. The dining area did already have a customer sat down. Did not get any food as was told to take away. There are no signs indicating dining area is closed.

With open sewage works outside it's not sanitary to eat outside at this time.

Worst staff behaviour. They think they own the place. Do not know how to talk to the customer. Staff named shravani had no manners and was just making faces and was so irritated while taking the order. They really need to work on thier service. Or itâ€™s not gonna be long that this outlet is gonna shut Tables are all dirty and customers have no place to sit. And the staff is least bothered to clean the tables and busy on the phones
